rules.name: sort
rules.description: Sorting creates duplicate content with different orderings. Noindex but allow following.

rules.name: color
rules.description: Color is a meaningful facet that can be indexed or mapped to clean paths.

rules.name: size
rules.description: Size is a meaningful attribute that can be indexed.

rules.name: page
rules.description: Pagination parameter. Page 1 is indexable; page 2+ are noindex with self-canonical.

rules.name: view
rules.description: UI preference parameter (grid/list view). Creates noise, should be noindexed and dropped from canonical.

rules.name: per_page
rules.description: Items-per-page UI preference. Creates explosive crawl space with no SEO value.

rules.name: price_min
rules.description: Dynamic price filter. Unless curated into buckets, these are unstable and should be noindexed.

rules.name: price_max
rules.description: Dynamic price filter. Unless curated into buckets, these are unstable and should be noindexed.

rules.name: q
rules.description: Search query parameter. Search pages default to noindex,follow to avoid thin content.

rules.name: utm_source
rules.description: Tracking parameter that should be stripped from canonical URLs and blocked in robots.

rules.name: utm_medium
rules.description: Tracking parameter that should be stripped from canonical URLs and blocked in robots.

rules.name: utm_campaign
rules.description: Tracking parameter that should be stripped from canonical URLs and blocked in robots.

protectedPaths.label: Protected & System Paths
protectedPaths.description: Block account pages and internal APIs while allowing robots/sitemap endpoints

trackingParams.label: Tracking & Session Parameters
trackingParams.description: Block URLs with tracking parameters to prevent crawl waste

searchPages.label: Internal Search Pages
searchPages.description: Block search pages entirely (alternative: use noindex,follow in meta robots instead)

uiPrefs.label: UI Preference Parameters
uiPrefs.description: Block view modes and pagination size to prevent explosive crawl

calendarPattern.label: Calendar Date Explosion
calendarPattern.description: Example: prevent crawling infinite date combinations

sortBlocking.label: Sort Parameter Blocking (Risky)
sortBlocking.description: WARNING: Blocking sort can prevent discovery of deeper paginated content. Use noindex,follow instead.

stackedUnstableStable.label: Stacked Unstable+Stable Blocking
stackedUnstableStable.description: Block combinations like ?sort=price&color=black. May prevent discovery of stable facet pages.
